snippet: LANE--Dr. Stanley L.,Sr. We mourn the passing of Dr. Stanley L. Lane, Sr., the father of our partner, Stanley L. Lane, Jr. We extend our deepest condolences to Stan, his wife, Ina, and their sons, Barrett and Darren, to Stan's sister, Sandra, her husband, Jonathan, and their children Jamie, Sarah, Scott and Joseph, and to Dr. Lane's wife, Alice, and her children, Karyn, her husband, Scott, and their children, Zachary and Alec, Jennifer, her husband, Craig, and their children Jonah, Allegra and Emilia, and Adam, his wife, Marni, and their son, Bennett. Otterbourg P.C. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LANE--Dr. Stanley L.,Sr. We mourn the passing of Dr. Stanley L. Lane, Sr., the father of our partner, Stanley L. Lane, Jr. We extend our deepest condolences to Stan, his wife, Ina, and their sons, Barrett and Darren, to Stan's sister, Sandra, her husband, Jonathan, and their children Jamie, Sarah, Scott and Joseph, and to Dr. Lane's wife, Alice, and her children, Karyn, her husband, Scott, and their children, Zachary and Alec, Jennifer, her husband, Craig, and their children Jonah, Allegra and Emilia, and Adam, his wife, Marni, and their son, Bennett. Otterbourg P.C. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LANE, DR. STANLEY L.
